about_the_game:
UNDER THE CONCRETE WAVE is a 3rd person platformer where ypu control robots designed to escape their underground BRUTALISM/CONCRETE habitat and explore the unknown world above ground. What challenges await you as you embark on your journey?




Rise above the structures that confine you. Look for the hidden paths and ladders that will lead you to higher ground. Do not be afraid to climb and push yourself upward, for the view from the top will be worth the effort.




You can make friends with them in different ways — some might be odd, others cool, some could offer support, while others might need your help. How would you build relationships with them?




You'll encounter odd contraptions powered by electricity and various puzzles to solve. You can approach them with wisdom and potentially reap rewards, or simply find your way through without guidance. I won't be the one dictating how you tackle these challenges.




Play with your friends, parents, lovers, children — joy of discover is brither when shared.
Connect via multiplayer for up to 16 players at the time or a splitscreen experience for up to 4 players
Get a chance to build a relationship with someone new joining the game via session browser

short_description: UNDER THE CONCRETE WAVE is a 3rd-person cooperative platformer where you alone or with friends take control of robots who have decided to leave the pit of monstrous brutalism. Jump, fall, throw objects, throw friends, solve puzzles (or not) on your way up.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Japanese, Serbian, Portuguese - Brazil
